coaches.name: Quyen Tu Le
coaches.description: With 2 years in community service, Quyen is passionate about creating visually stunning and user-friendly recycle products.

coaches.name: Emily Johnson
coaches.description: Emily specializes in coaching defensive strategies and has led multiple teams to championship victories.

coaches.name: Michael Nguyen
coaches.description: Michael is passionate about mentoring young players and focuses on improving their technical skills and teamwork.

coaches.name: Sophia Lee
coaches.description: Sophia brings a fresh perspective to coaching with her innovative training methods and strong emphasis on mental resilience.

faqs.question: Is it accessible?
faqs.answer: Yes. It adheres to the WAI-ARIA design pattern.

faqs.question: How do I install it?
faqs.answer: You can install it via npm or yarn by running the appropriate commands.

faqs.question: Can I customize the styles?
faqs.answer: Yes, the component supports full customization via CSS or a CSS-in-JS library.

faqs.question: Does it support dark mode?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! It is designed to work seamlessly with both light and dark modes.

faqs.question: Is it compatible with all browsers?
faqs.answer: It is compatible with modern browsers like Chrome, Firefox, and Safari. Legacy browsers may have limited support.

faqs.question: Can I use it in my React project?
faqs.answer: Yes, the component is built for React and works seamlessly in any React application.
